translations: v.给……增加水分，使湿润（moisturise 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Dry This may be another sign that your hair is not being moisturised.
sentences.translation: 头发干燥这也许是你的头发没有保持应有湿度的另一个征兆。

sentences.sentence: Very nice product that makes my face feel soft and well moisturised - lovely fragrance too.
sentences.translation: 非常好的产品，使用后皮肤感觉很柔软、滋润效果也不错，气味也很芳香。

sentences.sentence: I don't get cold sores but this is a really good lip salve. Lips stay soft and moisturised. Also has sun protection.
sentences.translation: 我没有唇疱疹，但是这个确实是好的唇膏，既软又保湿，同时又防晒。
